name: HIDESUBMIT Action Tag
description: Adds an action tag @HIDESUBMIT, which can be used in conjuction with branching logic to hide the submit button. When any field containing this action tag is visible on a survey due to branching logic, the Submit or Next Page button is removed. If all @HIDESUBMIT fields are hidden, the submit button becomes visible again. This allows users to easily control survey submission using familiar branching logic.
